summary: April 21 is the 111th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Quantrill's Raiders was a loosely organized force of pro-Confederate partisan rangers, "bushwhackers", who fought in the American Civil War under the leadership of William Clarke Quantrill. The name "Quantrill's Raiders" seems to have been attached to them long after the war, when the veterans would hold reunions.
title: Quantrill's Raiders
